title: Bug 113329Cascading Parameter Error
OB: details:Cascading Parameter Group can not runsteps to reproduce:1.New Cascading Parameter2.Set the Data set to "jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://spmdb:1433/test" and "select from Account"3.Select Value to "accountid" and Display Text to "accountid"4.Select Display type to "List Box"5.Set List Limit to "100"6.Press OK and Preview7.Select the parmeter and press OKactual result:It is error and said "Some required parameter values are not set or set toincompatible data type.
